messages.message: Hey to confirm - are goldens being preserved for advanced apps now?
There was an issue where the schema.json does not get included when compiling the flow, @Charles were you able to look into it. Other than this, we did not observe a loss of goldens for advanced apps
@suleiman.odat did you try the feature out for advanced apps? I still don’t have a full understanding of when the schema.json is included vs not included when compiling a solution

Yes, it was working for me, but with and without the schema.json. I tried it by having advanced app which after compiling the flow: 1) the file was not in the binary, and 2) added the file to  the binary manually. Both cases I did not lose any golden values
With this, are we saying Goldens are preserved if even schema.json is not there in the binary file? @Charles @suleiman.odat Can you guys do some more testing and confirm what is working?
Sounds good, I agree with @Charles currently I don't see issues, but will ask @vaishnavi and @Samyak to also test it with multiple use-cases to confirm
can we please get these kinds of tests run promptly vs waiting for my followup
